participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and thoughtful, with a passion for technology and a fondness for animals. Often finds comfort in quiet activities and has a quirky sense of style.
participant_1.background: I like to drink chai tea before bed every night. My dog is my best friend. I am terrified of spiders, but love snakes. At all times, I am wearing something black. I work as a computer technician, but secretly hate my job.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Analytical and reserved, with a love for storytelling and technology. Enjoys solitary activities and values independence, but appreciates deep conversations.
participant_2.background: I read ebooks more than hardcopies. I love watching superhero shows. I am single. I owe 2 monitors for work. I prefer iPhone over Samsung.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
What's your name?
I'm participant_2.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love reading, watching superhero shows, and playing video games.
Oh, that's cool. I love reading ebooks, too. I'm also single, but I have a dog.
That's awesome! I'm not a dog person, but I love snakes.
Really? That's interesting. I'm terrified of spiders, but I love snakes.
Yeah, they're so cool! I have two pet snakes.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of snakes?
I have a ball python and a corn snake.
Oh, those are both really cool snakes! I've always wanted a ball python.
They're great snakes. They're very calm and easy to care for.
That's good to know. I'm not sure if I'm ready for a snake yet, but maybe someday.
Yeah, they're definitely a lot of work. But they're so rewarding!
I can imagine. So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a computer technician.
Nice! What do you like about your job?
I like working with computers, and I like helping people.
That's awesome. I like working with computers, too. But I don't really like working with people.
Really? Why not?
I don't know. I guess I'm just not a very good people person.
I get that. I'm not very good at it either.
Well, it's good that we're both computer people.
Yeah, it is. We can just talk about computers all day long.
Exactly! That sounds like a great plan.
